::Firearm::

Firearm sighs, walking up to Spears and putting a hand on her 
shoulder.

"We'll get him back, one way or another."

He frowns at her question, wondering why she didn't know. She'd spent 
alot of time with the trainers, but it was probably all gone with the 
chip.

"The Trainers took you and Striker, that's as far as we know. We were 
able to get you back with the weapon Ramulus designed, but it had 
absolutely no effect on Striker. He .. just kept on shooting."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Spears::
> 
> She looked at him and gave him a faint smile. She knew somewhere in 
> her spark, he was just trying to give her hope.  But she knew that 
is 
> a bot is totally reprogrammed, then her love was gone. "Thank you."
> She looked down. "But I think you were right the first time. He's 
> gone. And for good." She couldn't help but let the tears fall again. 
> Her spark was broken.  She looked up. "Who did this to him? Who took 
> him away fro
